content.raw: So why don't you just pick up the built plugins? To build the plugin, you will anyways need the source code of gazebo. If you're only interested into distributing the .so files, it should be as easy as copying them elsewhere (as long as the target machine runs the same version of gazebo).
content.html: So why don't you just pick up the built plugins? To build the plugin, you will anyways need the source code of gazebo. If you're only interested into distributing the .so files, it should be as easy as copying them elsewhere (as long as the target machine runs the same version of gazebo).
